sample_text:
Zero Depreciation Claim 
In consideration of the payment of additional premium of Rs. ____ paid by the Insured and realized by the Insurer 
not withstanding anything to the contrary, it is hereby understood & agreed that for the purpose of this policy, in 
the event of partial loss, the depreciation applicable under Section I of this policy would stand deleted. 
Exclusion: This cover excludes the following parts, 
a) Tyres
b) Batteries
Specific Condition: The benefits under this cover may be availed for partial loss own damage claim, up to two 
times during every 12 month period of the policy.
